name: .HXS File Extension
summary: Learn about .HXS files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Help file compiled for Microsoft Help 2.0; contains help documentation for Windows or other programs; uses HTML for content and XML for metadata.

content: HXS files are similar to .CHM files, which are used by Help 1.x, but are formatted differently. They are created using the Microsoft Help 2.0 Compiler.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
